II.iii.3.A.3.a
.
Auto-Establish Process
Auto-Establish is an automatic process taking traditional paper compensation claims filed on
VA Form 21-526EZ
that have been received and scanned into the CM portal and
extracting data from the form, and
automatically establishing the claim in VBMS.
Note
:Â  A claim submitted on
VA Form 21-526EZ
to the CM portal using the Direct Upload tool will also go through the Auto-Establish process.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A - Claims Establishment
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A
